Title: Enacts the "Empire State Windfall Profits Tax Act"
Summary: Enacts the "Empire State Windfall Profits Tax Act", establishing an excise tax on the quarterly receipts of a company experiencing a profit windfall.
LawCode: Add ยง1105-c, Tax L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "Empire State Windfall Profits Tax Act"
